DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy new allergy medication
DOC.brief_title: A Study Of The Safety And Effectiveness Of A New Treatment For Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.detailed_description: Study withdraw prior determine study detail
DOC.criteria: Be least 6 year age , race , either gender . Have positive allergic history ocular allergy positive skin test reaction cat hair/dander , ragweed , tree and/or grass pollen within past 24 month . Have calculate bestcorrected visual acuity 0.6 logMar good eye measure use ETDRS chart . Positive bilateral CAC reaction Visit 1 & 2 . Have know contraindication , allergy , sensitivity use study medication , component . Any ocular condition , opinion investigator , could affect subject 's safety trial parameter Manifest sign symptom clinically active allergic conjunctivitis either eye baseline slitlamp exam visit
